level.heading: ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES[COLON] MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION —CCESSIBILITY STANDARDS (ยง 29-2318)

level.text: A substance abuse treatment facility or program shall provide or arrange for access to services free from all barriers. Specifically:
The program shall provide equal opportunity to qualified handicapped individuals; and
No barriers (architectural, communication, procedural and the like) to the delivery of services shall exist.

A substance abuse treatment facility or program shall establish policies and procedures that support accessibility to all qualified individuals. Established policies and procedures shall stipulate that individuals infected with the human immunodeficiency virus or acquired immunodeficiency syndrome have equal access to services.
